Gather your personal documents and place somewhere they can be easily located and ready to take with you should you have to evacuate.
Know how to shut off utilities. Know where gas pilots are located & how the heating & a.c. system works. For help call local utility company
Be prepared to survive on your own for a few days. Assemble a disaster kit. A list of supplies is here: http://bit.ly/2j0zNnL
Keep your automobile fully fueled. If electric power is cut off, gas stations may not be able to operate pumps for several days.
Make sure you know where your home’s safe room is located. See @FEMA website for what a safe room should look like: http://bit.ly/2vJw3NA
Prepare with storm shutters or plywood. Bring projectile items inside. http://bit.ly/2gJrBre
Know your area and the evacuation routes. Find yours here: http://bit.ly/2qnPWne
